examples: He wore a tweed suit and a reluctant orange tie.
Llevaba un traje de tweed y una reacia corbata naranja.
... to me, students seem reluctant to do this.
... para mí, los estudiantes parecen reacios a hacer esto.
The enemy were scattered into reluctant groups.
El enemigo se dispersó en grupos reacios.
... for their animals are reluctant to transfer them to ...
... porque sus animales se resisten a trasladarlos a ...
